column1: * The first rising of the Moon and Sun marks a new Years of the Sun.
* The Second Children of Ilúvatar of Ilúvatar
column3: Awakening of Men in the far east in Hildorien. Morgoth secretly leaves Angband
column4: committing command of the war to Sauron

column2: Fingolfins people complete the crossing of the Helcaraxë and arrive in the north-west of Middle-earth. Fingolfin marches across Dor Daedeloth and bangs on the gates of Angband; Morgoth remains hidden.

column1: * Battle of the Lammoth is fought and Argon is slain.
